field.name: carryForwardRuleId
field.remark: Rule ID of one-time free resource CARRY FORWARD

field.name: consumeFlag
field.remark: Bill consumption indicate Usage of free resource items 0: single item consumption 1: multiple items consumption

field.name: billingType
field.remark: 免费资源付费方式 0.预付费prepaid only； 1.后付费postpaid only； -1.不关注即prepaid & postpaid both

field.name: bonusUnitCycle
field.remark: 免费资源规整单位，一般按费率规整单位去规整。 举例：对于短信、梦网等按次业务的规整，单位一般配置成1。对于基本语音类业务的规整，一般配置成60。对于长途语音类业务的规整，一般配置成6
